CustomField.description: This is a formula field for who should receive the Loss Runs email in Zapier.
CustomField.formula: IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Jon Reiner', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Frank Barba', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Michael Freishtat', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Nishat Khan', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Lauren Buchholtz', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Kendall Bundy', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Rob Crocitto', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Eric Kerr', 'hannah.friedlich@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Matt Shanks', 'tyhea.wright@amwins.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Matt Athey', 'tyhea.wright@amwins.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Kim Zappa-Jackson', 'tyhea.wright@amwins.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Corey Turner', 'tyhea.wright@amwins.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Steve Schell', 'loretta.ruvolo@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Gregg Guerreiro', 'Dyenie.Efendi@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Doug Cordi', 'Dyenie.Efendi@rtspecialty.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Chris Kelly', 'InternationalLossRuns@cna.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Scale Underwriting', 'underwriting@scaleunderwriting.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Brad Hermanson', 'InternationalLossRuns@cna.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Account.Name = 'Decus Brokers','claims@decusbrokers.com', IF(Marketer_UW_Name__r.Full_Name__c = 'Andrea Ward', null, Marketer_UW_Email__c ))))))))))))))))))))
CustomField.label: Ella Loss Runs
